author: aldcroft
description:
Description: Solar Physics LibraryHomepage URL: http://www.sunpy.orgThe SunPy project is an effort to create an open-source software library for solar physics using the Python programming language.
To get started, download and install the latest version of SunPy.
 If you have questions about the project or would like to get involved, 
feel free to join us on IRC at #sunpy on Freenode.net, or sign up for 
the SunPy mailing list.
title: SunPy
